code: import React,{useState}from'react';import classes from'./Todo.module.scss';import Button from'../button/Button';import{findAllByDisplayValue}from'@testing-library/react';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Todo=_ref=>{let{todo,handleDone,handleDelete,handleEdit,setCurrentId,isEdit}=_ref;const[inputValue,setInputValue]=useState(todo.title);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:`${classes.li} ${todo.completed?classes.completed:''}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:classes.info,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["id: ",todo.id]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["title: ",todo.title]}),!todo.completed&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["completed: ",todo.completed?'true':'false']})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:classes.btns,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{name:'Edit',action:()=>setCurrentId(todo.id),color:'primary'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{name:'Done',action:()=>handleDone(todo.id),color:'secondary'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{name:'Delete',action:()=>{handleDelete(todo.id);},color:'error'})]})]}),isEdit&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:classes.li,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:inputValue,onChange:e=>setInputValue(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{name:'Save',color:'primary',action:()=>{handleEdit({...todo,title:inputValue});setCurrentId(null);}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{name:'Cancel',color:'error',action:()=>{setCurrentId(null);}})]})]});};export default Todo;
